sentence.Network_en: The  rescission of the contract will not be available after the completion of the sale.
sentence.Network_cn: 交易完成后，原合同便不能被废除。

sentence.Network_en: The last chapter discusses the effectiveness after the rescission.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后一章讨论的是合同解除的效力问题.

sentence.Network_en: Rescission is an important basic system of Contract law.
sentence.Network_cn: 合同解除是合同法上的一项重要的基本制度.

解除合同（Rescission）指合同当事人免除或终止履行合同义务的行为。各国法律均认为解除合同是一种法律救济方法。
whether or not rescission has retroactivity ., 合同解除是否具有溯及力.

list.abs: however , reports in Britain claim that they may make a move for Newcastle man Obafemi Martins , who scored17 goals last season and has a ￡ 13 m rescission clause .然而一份英国报道成尤文将目光转向了纽卡斯尔的马丁斯，后者上赛季有17个进球并且有1300万英镑的解约条款。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin rescissio(n-), from resciss-, 'split again', from the verb rescindere (see rescind)

means.word_mean: 1. (law) the act of rescinding; the cancellation of a contract and the return of the parties to the positions they would have had if the contract had not been made; recission may be brought about by decree or by mutual consent

sentences.en: The  rescission of the contract will not be available after the completion of the sale。
sentences.cn: 交易完成后，原合同便不能被废除。
